Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.notification

Class MceNotificationActionRegistry

java.lang.Object
co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.notification.MceNotificationActionRegistry
public class MceNotificationActionRegistry extends Object
This class is used for custom notification actions registration.

  • Method Details

    • registerNotificationAction

      public static boolean registerNotificationAction(android.content.Context context, String type, MceNotificationAction action)
      This method registers a new custom notification action
      Parameters:
      type - The type to register
      action - The action implementation. Null for using the SDK default action.

    • getNotificationAction

      public static MceNotificationAction getNotificationAction(android.content.Context context, String type)
      This method retrieves the registered notification action for a given notification type
      Parameters:
      type - The notification type
      Returns:
      The registered notification action impl or the SDK default notification action impl if no action was registered for the given type.

    • setUnknownAction

      public static void setUnknownAction(MceNotificationAction action)
      Sets a default action for all non standard MCE action types that has no other action registered to them.
      Parameters:
      action - The action

    • getUnknownAction

      public static MceNotificationAction getUnknownAction()
      Retrieves the default action for all non standard MCE action types that has no other action registered to them.
      Returns:
      The action

    • getAllActions

      public static Set<MceNotificationAction> getAllActions()
      Retrieves all the registered actions
      Returns:
      A set of all theregistered actions
